item.title: Collaborative online writing with Authorea
item.author: your@email.com (Your Name)
item.description: What is Authorea? Authorea is an online collaborative writing tool that allows researchers to write, cite, collaborate, host data and publish. It has been described as “Google Docs for Scientists”. We built Authorea to empower researchers, scientists, students with a tool that would make the writing of scholarly papers more fun and more collaborative. How do I use Authorea? https://www.authorea.com/users/92049/articles/110652-how-do-i-use-authorea You can start using Authorea in seconds by signing up for a free account and beginning a new document.
